Text: Hey Memi.  Wondering if you can help a girl out??  I bought a modded Wii from a friend, and they said "u just burn the games" and then play, wondering if you can explain in more detail.  Im not a computer noob, but have never burned a Wii ISO before and am pretty clueless.  Thx!

MemiBH,
Thanks so much for these files!!
Your awesome!!
They work great and playing it is fun!
therigas2 it is pretty easy... what program do you have? imgburn?
therigas2 it is pretty easy... what program do you have to burn your games with? i am using imgburn?
Hi man. What format must be on file? There is nothing! rar and iso is not working help please))

Should just burn it like any other image. Personally I use nero i find its quite user friendly and gets the job done flawlessly. Once you have nero installed it will prompt u like normal when u enter a blank dvd into your drive and go to start smart menu find image which is second from last on menu, browse for image select burn speed and such and your good to go :D
hi man ..... i have a non moded wii so will it work..............ps reply pls......
